code: import'./form.css';import{useState}from'react';import api from'../../service/api';import Table from'./table';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Form(){const[suppliers,setSuppliers]=useState([]);const[inputValue,setInputValue]=useState();const[showTable,setShowTable]=useState(false);async function loadSuppliers(){const response=await api.get("/fornecedores/".concat(inputValue));setSuppliers(response.data);setShowTable(true);}function handleChangeInputValue(e){if(e.target.value>0)setInputValue(e.target.value);}function handleSubmit(e){e.preventDefault();if(!inputValue)return;loadSuppliers();}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"form__consult",onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Qual o seu consumo mensal de energia (kWh)?"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",placeholder:"Ex.: 3000",value:inputValue,onChange:handleChangeInputValue}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>loadSuppliers(),type:"submit",children:"Pesquisar fornecedores"})]}),showTable&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Table,{suppliers:suppliers})]});}export default Form;
